  • Method Details

    • newCourier

      public Courier newCourier​(java.lang.String strName, java.lang.String strEmail, java.lang.Integer intNIF, java.lang.String strIBAN, Pharmacy oPharmacy) throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      The method receives Courier's name, email, nif, iban and Courier's pharmacy. The method generates a password and returns a new Courier.
      Parameters:
      strName - Courier's name.
      strEmail - Courier's email.
      intNIF - Courier's nif.
      strIBAN - Courier's iban.
      oPharmacy - Courier's Pharmacy.
      Throws:
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

    • registersCourier

      public boolean registersCourier​(Courier c)
      The methods registers a Courier on the Database.
      Parameters:
      c - Courier instance
      Returns:
      true if the Courier is registered on the Database. False otherwise.
